name: Monkey Land
description:
The monkey needs all the food becuse the monkey and the monkey family is hungry in the jungle.  They have no food and its one place where it's food and it is behind the jungle..

Catch all the fruits and don't let them land in the ground! If you do the monkey will cry with the family:(

In this game you need to catch fruits.

Controlls:

Steer with W,A,S,D or the arrow keys
